calibration.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 """!
2 @file calibration.py
3 @brief Скрипт калибровки датчиков навигационного модуля:
4 магнетометра, акселерометра, гироскопа.
5 Калибровка магнетометра производится отдельно от гироскопа
6 и акселерометра. Для калибровки магнетометра необходимо
7 вращать модуль вокруг трех осей на протяжении всего процесса
8 сбора данных. Для калибровки гироскопа и акселерометра модуль
9 необходимо держать неподвижно строго параллельно земле.
10 """

24 class ConfigError(Exception):
25  """!Исключение. Вызывается при неправильной настройке датчика"""
26 
27  def __init__(self, allowed_values):
28  """!"""
29  description = "Not a valid config. Value must be in %s" % allowed_values
30  super().__init__(description)
31 
32 
33 class Sensor:
34  """!класс Sensor. Является базовым для всех датчиков"""
35 
36  @abstractmethod
37  def startup():
38  """!инициализация датчика"""
39  pass
40 
41  @abstractmethod
42  def get_binary_data():
43  """!чтение двоичных данных из регистров датчиков"""
44  pass
45 
46  @staticmethod
47  def get_16bit_value(low, high):
48  """!Преобразование старшего и младшего байтов в 16-битное число
49  @param low младший байт
50  @param high старший байти
51  @return value 2-х байтовое значение
52  """
53  value = (high << 8) | low
54 
55  if (value > 32768):
56  value = value - 65536
57  return value
58

60 class Magnetometer(Sensor):
61  """!"""
62 
63  def __init__(self):
64  """!"""
65  self._mx = 0
66  self._my = 0
67  self._mz = 0
68  self._magnetometer_range = 0
69 
70  def setM(self, mx, my, mz):
71  """!"""
72  self._mx = mx
73  self._my = my
74  self._mz = mz
75 
76  def set_magnetometer_range(self, sensor_range):
77  """!"""
78  self._magnetometer_range = sensor_range
79 
80  def getM(self):
81  """!"""
82  return self._mx, self._my, self._mz
83 
84  def get_magnetometer_range(self):
85  """!"""
86  return self._magnetometer_range

100  """!"""
101  self._ax = ax
102  self._ay = ay
103  self._az = az
104

106  """!"""

112

118 class Gyroscope(Sensor):

124  self._gy = 0
125  self._gz = 0
126  self._gyroscope_range
127 
128  def setG(self, gx, gy, gz):
129  """!"""
130  self._gx = gx
131  self._gy = gy
132  self._gz = gz
133

163 class MPU6050(Accelerometer, Gyroscope):
164  """!"""
165 
166  PWR_M = 0x6B
167  DIV = 0x19
168  CONFIG = 0x1A
169  GYRO_CONFIG = 0x1B
170  ACCEL_CONFIG = 0x1C
171  INT_EN = 0x38
172  ACCEL_XOUT_H = 0x3B
173  ACCEL_XOUT_L = 0x3C
174  ACCEL_YOUT_H = 0x3D
175  ACCEL_YOUT_L = 0x3E
176  ACCEL_ZOUT_H = 0x3F
177  ACCEL_ZOUT_L = 0x40
178  TEMP_OUT_H = 0x41
179  TEMP_OUT_L = 0x42
180  GYRO_XOUT_H = 0x43
181  GYRO_XOUT_L = 0x44
182  GYRO_YOUT_H = 0x45
183  GYRO_YOUT_L = 0x46
184  GYRO_ZOUT_H = 0x47
185  GYRO_ZOUT_L = 0x48
186 
187  ACCEL_RANGE_2G = 0x00
188  ACCEL_RANGE_4G = 0x08
189  ACCEL_RANGE_8G = 0x10
190  ACCEL_RANGE_16G = 0x18
191 
192  GYRO_RANGE_250DEG = 0x00
193  GYRO_RANGE_500DEG = 0x08
194  GYRO_RANGE_1000DEG = 0x10
195  GYRO_RANGE_2000DEG = 0x18
196 
197  MPU6050_ADDR = 0x68
198 
199  def __init__(self, bus, accel_range=2, gyro_range=250):
200  """!"""
201 
202  allowed_accel_range = (2, 4, 8, 16)
203  allowed_gyro_range = (250, 500, 1000, 2000)
204 
205  if accel_range not in allowed_accel_range:
206  raise ConfigError(allowed_accel_range)
207  if gyro_range not in allowed_gyro_range:
208  raise ConfigError(allowed_gyro_range)
209 
210  if accel_range == 2:
211  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_2G
212  elif accel_range == 4:
213  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_4G
214  elif accel_range == 8:
215  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_8G
216  elif accel_range == 16:
217  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_16G
218 
219  if gyro_range == 250:
220  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_250DEG
221  elif accel_range == 500:
222  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_500DEG
223  elif accel_range == 1000:
224  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_1000DEG
225  elif accel_range == 2000:
226  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_2000DEG
227 
228  self.bus = bus
229  self.set_accelerometer_range(float(accel_range))
230  self.set_gyroscope_range(float(gyro_range))
231 
232  def startup(self):
233  """
234  Configuring Sensor with writing values to configure registers
235  """
236  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.DIV, 7)
237  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.PWR_M, 1)
238  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.CONFIG, 0)
239  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.GYRO_CONFIG, self.gyro_config)
240  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.ACCEL_CONFIG, self.accel_config)
241  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.INT_EN, 1)
242  rospy.sleep(1)
243 
244  def read_status(self):
245  """
246  Read status register of sensor
247  """
248  return self.bus.read_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.REG_STATUS)
249 
250  def get_binary_data(self, calibrated=False):
251  """
252  reading data registers with values which provided by sensor
253  param calibrated: if flag is on, apply calibration params to calculate values
254  return:
255  ax, ay, az - the projections of the gravity vector onto the axis x, y, z
256  gx, gy, gz - angles of rotation about the axis x, y, z
257  """
258  buf = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.ACCEL_XOUT_H, 14)
259  ax = self.get_16bit_value(buf[1], buf[0])
260  ay = self.get_16bit_value(buf[3], buf[2])
261  az = self.get_16bit_value(buf[5], buf[4])
262 
263  gx = self.get_16bit_value(buf[9], buf[8])
264  gy = self.get_16bit_value(buf[11], buf[10])
265  gz = self.get_16bit_value(buf[13], buf[12])
266 
267  self.setA(ax, ay, az)
268  self.setG(gx, gy, gz)
269 
270  return ax, ay, az, gx, gy, gz
271 
272 
273 class QMC5883(Magnetometer):
274  """!"""
275 
276  XOUT_LSB = 0x00
277  XOUT_MSB = 0x01
278  YOUT_LSB = 0x02
279  YOUT_MSB = 0x03
280  ZOUT_LSB = 0x04
281  ZOUT_MSB = 0x05
282  REG_STATUS = 0x06
283  TOUT_LSB = 0x07
284  TOUT_MSB = 0x08
285  REG_CONTROL_1 = 0x09
286  REG_CONTROL_2 = 0x0A
287  REG_PERIOD = 0x0B
288  ADDRESS = 0x0D
289 
290  # Oversampling values for the CONFIG register
291  CONFIG_OS512 = 0b00000000
292  CONFIG_OS256 = 0b01000000
293  CONFIG_OS128 = 0b10000000
294  CONFIG_OS64 = 0b11000000
295 
296  # Range values for the CONFIG register
297  CONFIG_2GAUSS = 0b00000000
298  CONFIG_8GAUSS = 0b00010000
299 
300  # Rate values for the CONFIG register
301  CONFIG_10HZ = 0b00000000
302  CONFIG_50HZ = 0b00000100
303  CONFIG_100HZ = 0b00001000
304  CONFIG_200HZ = 0b00001100
305 
306  # Mode values for the CONFIG register
307  CONFIG_STANDBY = 0b00000000
308  CONFIG_CONT = 0b00000001
309 
310  # Mode values for the CONFIG2 register
311  CONFIG2_INT_DISABLE = 0b00000001
312  CONFIG2_ROL_PTR = 0b01000000
313  CONFIG2_SOFT_RST = 0b10000000
314 
315  # INI_FILE = Path(__file__).resolve().parent / 'settings' / 'QMC5883.ini'
316 
317  def __init__(self, bus, oversampling=512, range=2, rate=100, mode=1):
318  """!"""
319 
320  allowed_oversampling = (512, 256, 128, 64)
321  allowed_range = (2, 8)
322  allowed_rate = (10, 50, 100, 200)
323  allowed_mode = (0, 1)
324 
325  if oversampling not in allowed_oversampling:
326  raise ConfigError(allowed_oversampling)
327  if range not in allowed_range:
328  raise ConfigError(allowed_range)
329  if rate not in allowed_rate:
330  raise ConfigError(allowed_rate)
331  if mode not in allowed_mode:
332  raise ConfigError(allowed_mode)
333 
334  if oversampling == 512:
335  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS512
336  elif oversampling == 256:
337  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS256
338  elif oversampling == 128:
339  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS128
340  elif oversampling == 64:
341  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS64
342 
343  if range == 2:
344  self.range_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_2GAUSS
345  elif range == 8:
346  self.range_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_8GAUSS
347 
348  if rate == 10:
349  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_10HZ
350  elif rate == 50:
351  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_50HZ
352  elif rate == 100:
353  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_100HZ
354  elif rate == 200:
355  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_200HZ
356 
357  if mode == 0:
358  self.mode_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_STANDBY
359  elif mode == 1:
360  self.mode_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_CONT
361 
362  self.oversampling = oversampling
363  self.range = range
364  self.rate = rate
365  self.mode = mode
366 
367  self.bus = bus
368  self.set_magnetometer_range(float(range))
369 
370  def startup(self):
371  """
372  Configuring Sensor with writing values to configure registers
373  """
374  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_CONTROL_1,
375  self.oversampling_config | self.range_config | self.rate_config | self.mode_config)
376  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_CONTROL_2, QMC5883.CONFIG2_ROL_PTR)
377  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_PERIOD, 0x01)
378  rospy.sleep(1)
379 
380  def read_status(self):
381  """
382  Read status register of sensor
383  """
384  return self.bus.read_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, self.REG_STATUS)
385 
386  def get_binary_data(self):
387  """
388  reading data registers with values which provided by sensor
389  param calibrated: if flag is on, apply calibration params to calculate values
390  return:
391  x, y, z - the projections of the magnetic vector onto the axis x, y, z
392  """
393  buf = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, self.XOUT_LSB, 6)
394  x = Sensor.get_16bit_value(buf[0], buf[1])
395  y = Sensor.get_16bit_value(buf[2], buf[3])
396  z = Sensor.get_16bit_value(buf[4], buf[5])
397 
398  self.setM(x, y, z)
399 
400  return x, y, z

404 class InertialNavigationSystem:
405  """!"""
406 
407  def __init__(self):
408  """!"""
409 
410  self.sensors = {}
411 
412  self._ax = 0
413  self._ay = 0
414  self._az = 0
415  self._gx = 0
416  self._gy = 0
417  self._gz = 0
418  self._mx = 0
419  self._my = 0
420  self._mz = 0
421 
422  self.roll = 0
423  self.pitch = 0
424  self.yaw = 0
425  self.vx = 0
426  self.vy = 0
427  self.vz = 0
428  self.xpos = 0
429  self.ypos = 0
430  self.depth = 0
431 
432  self.config_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.dirname(__file__)), 'config/calibration.yaml')
433 
434 
435  def startup_sensors(self, sensors):
436  """!"""
437 
438  for sensor in sensors:
439  if isinstance(sensor, Accelerometer):
440  self.sensors['accelerometer'] = sensor
441  if isinstance(sensor, Gyroscope):
442  self.sensors['gyroscope'] = sensor
443  if isinstance(sensor, Magnetometer):
444  self.sensors['magnetometer'] = sensor
445  sensor.startup()
446  if not self.sensors['accelerometer'] or not self.sensors['gyroscope']:
447  raise NotImplementedError
448  if not self.sensors['magnetometer']:
449  raise Warning
450 
451  def set_real_sensor_values(self):
452  """
453  convert raw binary sensor values into decimal unit system
454  """
455 
456  def convert(data, sensor_range):
457  for index in range(len(data)):
458  data[index] = data[index] / 32768.0 * sensor_range
459  return data
460 
461  sensors = set(val for val in self.sensors.values())
462  for sensor in sensors:
463  sensor.get_binary_data()
464  ax, ay, az = self.sensors['accelerometer'].getA()
465  gx, gy, gz = self.sensors['gyroscope'].getG()
466  mx, my, mz = self.sensors['magnetometer'].getM()
467  self._ax, self._ay, self._az = convert([ax, ay, az], self.sensors['accelerometer'].get_accelerometer_range())
468  self._gx, self._gy, self._gz = convert([gx, gy, gz], self.sensors['gyroscope'].get_gyroscope_range())
469  self._mx, self._my, self._mz = convert([mx, my, mz], self.sensors['magnetometer'].get_magnetometer_range())
470 
471  def get_v(self):
472  """!"""
473  return self._ax, self._ay, self._az, self._gx, self._gy, self._gz
474 
475  def __calibrate_magnetometer(self, rounds):
476  """
477  Magnetometer calibration
478  rounds: number of read cycles
479  """
480  xmin, ymin, zmin = 32767, 32767, 32767
481  xmax, ymax, zmax = -32768, -32768, -32768
482  print("Rotate compass")
483  rospy.sleep(4)
484  for _ in range(rounds):
485  self.set_real_sensor_values()
486  self._mx, self._my, self._mz = -self._mx, -self._my, -self._mz
487  print(self._mx, self._my, self._mz)
488 
489  xmin = min(xmin, self._mx)
490  ymin = min(ymin, self._my)
491  zmin = min(zmin, self._mz)
492 
493  xmax = max(xmax, self._mx)
494  ymax = max(ymax, self._my)
495  zmax = max(zmax, self._mz)
496  rospy.sleep(0.05)
497 
498  x_offset = (xmax + xmin) / 2
499  y_offset = (ymax + ymin) / 2
500  z_offset = (zmax + zmin) / 2
501 
502  chord_x = (xmax - xmin) / 2.0
503  chord_y = (ymax - ymin) / 2.0
504  chord_z = (zmax - zmin) / 2.0
505 
506  chord_average = (chord_x + chord_y + chord_z) / 3.0
507 
508  x_scale = chord_average / chord_x
509  y_scale = chord_average / chord_y
510  z_scale = chord_average / chord_z
511 
512  with open(self.config_path, 'r') as f:
513  conf = yaml.safe_load(f)
514 
515  conf["Magnetometer"]["mxoffset"] = x_offset
516  conf["Magnetometer"]["myoffset"] = y_offset
517  conf["Magnetometer"]["mzoffset"] = z_offset
518  conf["Magnetometer"]["mxscale"] = x_scale
519  conf["Magnetometer"]["myscale"] = y_scale
520  conf["Magnetometer"]["mzscale"] = z_scale
521 
522  with open(self.config_path, 'w') as f:
523  yaml.dump(conf, f, default_flow_style=False)
524 
525  def __calibrate_gyroscope_and_accelerometer(self, rounds):
526  """
527  Gyroscope and accelerometer calibration
528  rounds: number of read cycles
529  """
530  gxcal, gycal, gzcal = 0, 0, 0
531  axcal, aycal, azcal = 0, 0, 0
532  print("Keep gyroscope steady")
533  rospy.sleep(6)
534  for _ in range(rounds):
535  self.set_real_sensor_values()
536  self._ax, self._ay, self._az = -self._ax, -self._ay, -self._az
537  self._gx, self._gy, self._gz = -self._gx, -self._gy, -self._gz
538 
539  print(round(self._ax, 2), round(self._ay, 2), round(self._az, 2), round(self._gx, 2), round(self._gy, 2),
540  round(self._gz, 2))
541 
542  gxcal += self._gx
543  gycal += self._gy
544  gzcal += self._gz
545  axcal += self._ax
546  aycal += self._ay
547  azcal += self._az - 1
548 
549  rospy.sleep(.05)
550 
551  gxcal /= rounds
552  gycal /= rounds
553  gzcal /= rounds
554  axcal /= rounds
555  aycal /= rounds
556  azcal /= rounds
557 
558  with open(self.config_path, 'r') as f:
559  conf = yaml.safe_load(f)
560 
561  conf["Gyroscope"]["gxoffset"] = gxcal
562  conf["Gyroscope"]["gzoffset"] = gycal
563  conf["Gyroscope"]["gyoffset"] = gzcal
564  conf["Accelerometer"]["axoffset"] = axcal
565  conf["Accelerometer"]["ayoffset"] = aycal
566  conf["Accelerometer"]["azoffset"] = azcal
567 
568  with open(self.config_path, 'w') as f:
569  yaml.dump(conf, f, default_flow_style=False)
570 
571  def configure_system(self):
572  """
573  System setup
574  """
575  self.__calibrate_magnetometer(600)
576  self.__calibrate_gyroscope_and_accelerometer(600)
577  # self.__compute_std(1000)
578  # with open(self.config_path, 'w+') as config_params:
579  # self.configparser.write(config_params)
580 
581 
582 
583 if __name__ == '__main__':
584  try:
585  bus = smbus.SMBus(1)
586  sys = InertialNavigationSystem()
587  sys.startup_sensors([MPU6050(bus), QMC5883(bus)])
588  sys.configure_system()
589  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
590  pass
